JUSTICE BURKE delivered the opinion of the court:

Plaintiffs Robin and Elizabeth Senesac appeal from an order of the circuit court dismissing their second amended complaint against defendants Employer's Vocational Resources, Inc. (EVR), CCM, Inc., d/b/a Creative Case Managment (CCM), and State Farm Fire and Casualty Company (State Farm), alleging negligence and intentional infliction of emotional distress, pursuant to section 2--619 of the Illinois Code of Civil Procedure (735 ILCS 5/2--619 (West 1998)).  The trial court granted defendants' motions to dismiss based on its finding that plaintiffs' common law claims were barred by the exclusivity provision of the Illinois Workers' Compensation Act.
